arti.title: British ISIS 'member used Bitcoin to help militants escape Syrian prison camps'
arti.description: Hisham Chaudhary of Oadby faces seven terror charges, including counts of disseminating a terrorist publication, membership of a proscribed organisation and counts of entering a funding arrangement.
arti.content:
A British ISIS member alleged to have used Bitcoin to send money abroad to help captured militants escape Syrian prison camps, has appeared before court.
